name: Adult Red Dracolich
proficiencies: Saving Throw: DEX +6 | Saving Throw: CON +13, WIS +7, CHA +11 | Skill: Perception +13 | Skill: Stealth +6
senses: Blindsight 60 ft. | Darkvision 120 ft., Passive Perception 23

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day).
special_abilities.desc: If the dracolich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
special_abilities.desc: The dracolich has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack.
actions.desc: The dracolich can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d10 + 8) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d6 + 8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence.
actions.desc: Each creature of the dracolich's choice that is within 120 feet of the dracolich and aware of it must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dracolich's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5–6).
actions.desc: The dracolich exhales fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 (18d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
